snippet: North Korea is in talks to hold a world championship weight lifting event, although a International Weightlifting Federation official said a junior event was more likely than one at the senior level.
abstract: North Korea, long an outsider in sports, is in talks with International Weightlifting Federation to host a world championship event, after North Korean weight lifters won a dozen medals at 2014 world championships in Almaty, Kazakhstan.
lead_paragraph: North Korea is in talks to hold a world championship weight lifting event, although a International Weightlifting Federation official said a junior event was more likely than one at the senior level.

headline.seo: North Korea Seeks to Host a Weight Lifting Event
headline.main: Weight Lifting Pries Open Doors to a Hermit Kingdom
headline.print_headline: Weight Lifting Pries Open Doors to a Hermit Kingdom
